name: Destruct
description:
Destruct!

We need you to clear out this old neighborhood in order to make room for a new one to be constructed in the same spot.  Unfortunately, all we have to destroy it with is this grenade launcher and this box of infinite grenades.
Do your best to blow up all of the buildings before the new construction crew arrives.


I was actually super busy this weekend and didn't have a lot of time to put into this game jam, but I hope you like it.

Requires a decent CPU more than a good GPU,
